title: Roasted cauliflower cheese
description: Roasting the cauliflower rather than boiling it will intensify the flavour and lend a delicious sweetness to the dish. Adding  mustard to the sauce adds a depth of flavour that means the recipe needs less cheese than normal.
ingredients: 1 large head cauliflower, cut into florets
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
15g/½oz parmesan, or similar vegetarian hard cheese, finely grated
